articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: Supreme Court allows Biden admin to continue asking tech firms to address controversial social media posts - Fox Business
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court said it will allow the White House to continue its efforts to combat controversial social media posts along with tech companies.
articles.content: The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday said it would indefinitely block a lower court order that curbed efforts by the Biden administration to get tech companies to remove misleading social media posts fro… [+2654 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Race To Defuse a “Ticking” Public Health Time Bomb - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The surge in diseases transmitted by ticks throughout numerous regions of the United States in the past fifty years poses a significant threat to public health, necessitating innovative solutions, caution a team of scientists from Yale. In a review article, t…
articles.content:
ByYale UniversityOctober 20, 2023
